title: (x) Monmouthshire Radio - Berlinsans {Yves}
content:
Can anyone identify both these fonts?

author: tartarus

comments.content: [David Berlow](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235229/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/David%252BBerlow)’s [Berlin Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235229/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.2957.1.5&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=MONMOUTHSHIRE+local+radio&sampleSize=24), formerly of [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235229/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/FontFont), now also available through [The Font Bureau, Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235229/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/The%252BFont%252BBureau%25252C%252BInc.)
